problem.markdown:
>>Which statement is NOT true about Kanban?<< ( ) Kanban is a pull manufacturing system, which can adapt demand fluctuations and disruptions. ( X ) Material is the only thing that flows in the factory. ( ) In the Single-Card Kanban system, if the last machine stops for a long enough time, it can prevent the next to last from working. If the stoppage lasts long enough, the machine upstream of that can be prevented from working.
[explanation] Kanban is an information system for controlling production quantity and timing. Kanbans circlet within factories and between factories. [explanation]

multiplechoiceresponse.label: Which statement is NOT true about Kanban?

choicegroup.choice: Kanban is a pull manufacturing system, which can adapt demand fluctuations and disruptions.
Material is the only thing that flows in the factory.

In the Single-Card Kanban system, if the last machine stops for a long enough time, it can prevent the next to last from working. If the stoppage lasts long enough, the machine upstream of that can be prevented from working.

div.p: Kanban is an information system for controlling production quantity and timing. Kanbans circlet within factories and between factories.
